message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take this deal before inflation eats into your share!
I think I deserve a bit more, considering inflation is on my back!
Bob, this is a better deal than you'll get next round.  Inflation is hitting both of us - let's be sensible.
I'd rather take a bigger share now, before inflation eats into it even more!
Bob, this is my final offer. It's clear inflation is hurting you more than me. Let's end this now before we both lose out further.
